name: FireRange Assassin:Sniper City
description:
FireRange Assassin: Sniper City is an army assassin sniper shooting game where you will become a Special Forces elite sniper. Terrorists occupied the city, creating chaos in the city, threatening innocent people. You accept the army's mission, go to the front, destroy the city's terrorists, and restore the city's peace.
Features:
- Thrilling fighting
- Real environmental effects
- Exciting shooting mission
- Shocked music and sound effects
- Real and challenging FPS sniper experience
